pages.text: $(bold)$(6)Liquid Zorumite$() is of great use to alchemists, as $(d)Zorumite$() in its fluid form has the ability to transform blocks into other blocks! It can be obtained by placing a $(d)Zorumite$() of any sort on the ground and lighting it with flint and steel.
These vials can be used to hold any type of $(d)Liquid Zorumite$(). This filled vial can then be applied to different blocks to transform them.
